column2: "Hey, <%me>, perfect timing. Would you mind joining me on a request?"
"It's another tough one. We need to look into what's making the Dragonkin go berserk."
"They're even harder to deal with than the ones in Volcanic Caverns, so it'd really be great if I could get your help."
"If we make some progress on the matter, it might even help our fellow ARKS members. So don't let me down!"
